name: Go Go Magnet
description:
WELCOME TO GO GO MAGNET!
Explore the seas and collect treasure!
Collect ships and create your own crew!

FISHING
- Discover the riches of the oceans and burn energy fishing!
- Collect all types of resources, coins, maps, and battle starters!

TRAVEL AND DISCOVER ALL THE ISLANDS
- Collect maps along the way which guide you to the next stage of your travels!
- Take on the rulers in an epic battle at the end of each chapter in order to move on to the next one!

ATTACK OTHER PLAYERS' BOATS
- Start battles when fishing or fight back against your enemies.
- Win the battle to become the richest of the oceans by stealing gold from your opponents!
-Hide your precious treasures by throwing maps and attacking other players’ hideouts!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR CREW AND COLLECT BOATS
- Unlock lots of fun characters!
- Equip them, and they will appear on your current boat, Amazing !!
- Build new beautiful boats with resources to increase your storage capacity!

PARTICIPATE IN EVENTS
- Achieve side objectives to experience an even more exciting adventure!
- Be the best and fish for specific items!

Go Go Magnet! is the most exciting fishing game on mobile!
You always dreamed of becoming the king of the oceans?
So wake up the explorer in you and join the adventure now !!

Join the most amazing Pirate Crew by following Go Go Magnet on Social Networks!
Exclusive bonuses and surprises are waiting for you and your friends.
Discord: https://discord.gg/zFVer35QmV
